name: Snake Eyes (cnearman)
description:
Made for the 50 hour 2022 GMTK Jam. Please leave a rating at: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1618709

In Snake Eyes, you play as a hungry, hungry snake, snacking on nearby dice to obtain their symbols, match a part of your body to the sequence shown to unlock further levels, and eventually obtain the fabled Snake Treasure.

If you had fun with the main game, check out the Endless Mode to play more.

Controls:  Use WASD or Arrows.

Created in Unity by Chris Nearman and Adam Pettyjohn for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Tools:

  • Unity
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • FL Studio
